name: Covey
description: Covey is a community to find and reward the best investment analysts for anyone to co-trade with. At our heart is Covey Training Club, a competitive community where beginner and experienced analysts alike are rewarded for testing and credentializing their investment strategies, risk-free. The best earn CVY tokens: used for governance, staking, and discounts in the Covey Legends app, where anyone can co-trade with the top 1% from our community of analysts.
